content: रंजन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Colouring, dyeing. {@--2@} Pleasing, gratifying, delighting. {@--3@} Exciting passion. {@--4@} Conciliating, keeping contented. --नं [ रज्यतेऽनन रंज्-करणे ल्युट्] {@--1@} Colouring dyeing, painting. {@--2@} Colour, dye. {@--3@} Pleasing, delighting; keeping contented, gratifying, giving pleasure; राजा प्रजारंजनलब्धवर्णः <ls>R. 6. 21</ls>; तथैव सोऽभूदन्वर्थो राजा प्रकृतिरंजनात् <ls n="R.">4. 12</ls>. {@--4@} Red sandal-wood. {@--5@} The Munja grass. {@--6@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) Nasalizing (a sound.).
